## SendableLiquity.pngStakeUniTokens() method

Stake Png Pool2 LP tokens to participate in liquidity mining and earn LQTY.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
pngStakeUniTokens(amount: Decimalish): Promise<SentLiquityTransaction<S, LiquityReceipt<R, void>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of LP tokens to add to new or existing stake. |

Promise&lt;[SentLiquityTransaction](./lib-base.sentliquitytransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [LiquityReceipt](./lib-base.liquityreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, void&gt;&gt;&gt;
